resources.string: a nice guy v(start ble whit documentation)

Available commands:
 - help: Display this help message
 - clear: Clear the terminal
 - checkpoint: Display current timestamp
 - askBlPerms: Request Bluetooth permissions
 - turnOnBl: Enable Bluetooth
 - turnOffBl: Disable Bluetooth
 - getBlDs: Scan for Bluetooth devices
 - conByNameBL [DeviceName]: Connect to a Bluetooth device by name
 - disBL: Disconnect current Bluetooth device
 - sendbl [message]: Send message via Bluetooth
 - startBlListener: Start Bluetooth listener
